document_data.name: Monastery of the Sun
document_data.mainbody: The '''Monastery of the Sun''' was a [[monastery]] dedicated to [[Amaunator]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The temple stood four storys tall.
document_data.Location: The Monastery of the Sun was located in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] in a neighborhood bordered by the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] to the west, [[Lamp Street]] to the south, and [[Andamaar's Street]] to the north and east.{{Cite interactive atlas|Dead Trades Ward}}
document_data.History: The temple served as the base of operations for the [[Order of the Sun Soul]], a monastic order originating in ancient [[Netheril]] who followed [[Amaunator]] and later [[Lathander]], [[Sel√ªne]], and [[Sune]].
